ending: ^>>A few months have passed, and things have died down.
^Lilypad Landing went back to its 0% crime rate, but maybe that's just because it's a peaceful place.
^I haven't gotten any new assignments since the murder case, but Detective Toadshoe keeps reassuring me that I'll get something soon.
^Toadshoe also reassures me that Bale was indeed the right answer, but won't tell me what he said during the interrogation.
^I'd like to believe that's true, but for now I guess I just have to assume...
true_ending: ^>>*bzzt* ^YOU>>Yes? ^TOADSHOE>>We need you down here for the interrogation. ^Are you coming? ^YOU>>Yes! I'll be right there! ^YOU>>So that's him? ^TOADSHOE>>Yep. That's Bale. ^I'll ask him a few questions, but feel free to interject with any evidence you may have. ^>>*creeeeeeak* ^TOADSHOE>>So, Bale. ^Have anything to say for yourself? ^BALE>>... ^TOADSHOE>>Not much of a talker, are you? ^It's okay, let's take our mind off of the situation at hand for now, shall we? ^How's Erica doing? ^BALE>>............ ^TOADSHOE>>You had some plans to celebrate your birthday when she got back, right? ^BALE>>........................... ^TOADSHOE>>Has she come back yet? ^BALE>>You......! ^Hmph... ^TOADSHOE>>Now, that's enough small talk. ^Let's discuss what we're really here for. ^YOU>>I found this shirt near your house. ^Bale, does this look familiar to you? ^BALE>>...!!! ^YOU>>I thought so. ^Would you care to explain what this is? ^BALE>>I will not be subjected to such torment...! ^TOADSHOE>>Bale, look. ^We understand your frustration and your loss. ^We know that your loved ones are irreplaceable, and that the time came too soon for her to go. ^But Pelo must have had those that cherished him too, don't you think? ^BALE>>You... ^No, you don't understand...! ^You don't know...! ^Have you felt the pain of doing everything you can, only for them to disappear anyway? ^I wrote Buff Frog, asking him to save her. ^But he was "too busy" dealing with some other frog's issue. ^Trying to help some "Pelo" guy. ^It's only natural that he should know what it's like to go through what I did! ^I lost someone close to me, so he lost someone close to him. ^Is that not fair? ^TOADSHOE>>... ^Bale... ^You might not want to hear this, but... ^Pelo's letter... ^...was about Erica. ^BALE>>......!!!!!! ^No... ^No, you're lying... ^No, it can't...! ^TOADSHOE>>Again, we understand what you've lost. ^But a murder is a murder, and Pelo was innocent. ^We're sorry, but... ^...we'll have to arrest you now. ^BALE>>No... No......!!! ^YOU>>Detective Toadshoe... ^TOADSHOE>>Yes? ^YOU>>Was... ^Was that the right choice? ^TOADSHOE>>What do you mean? ^YOU>>He was clearly hurting. ^He just needed someone to acknowledge him, someone to hear him... ^...but no one was there. ^So he got attention his own way. ^But...did we really have to be so harsh...? ^TOADSHOE>>I see where you're coming from. ^And I agree, he had his reasons. ^But we can't let frogs go, thinking murder is right. ^Our job is to keep the Forest safe. ^YOU>>And to make it a better place... ^TOADSHOE>>Yes. ^And his sentence isn't lifelong. ^Some frogs may be cold-blood killers, but him... ^He can learn from his mistakes. I know he can. ^YOU>>I suppose you're right... ^TOADSHOE>>But regardless, I thank you. ^YOU>>Me...? ^TOADSHOE>>Your bravery, determination, and empathy will go a long way. ^And that's what makes you such a great detective. ^YOU>>Really...? ^TOADSHOE>>Yes. ^Say, how would you like... ^...to be promoted? ^YOU>>...! ^You... You mean it? ^TOADSHOE>>Of course. ^I think you can go on to do great things. ^I recognize your talent. This case, it's not just beginner's luck or a fluke. ^So go ahead, make the Forest a better place. ^YOU>>...Thank you...! ^I don't know if I'll be able to live up to your expectations, but I'll try! ^TOADSHOE>>You might not know, but I do. ^So keep up the good work, Head Detective. end
